GR14muktacau:101: tato'ṣṭa-vidha-yonija-mauktikebhyo vilakṣaṇāṃ śriyaṃ dadhati muktāphalāni tāsu

GR14muktacau:146: kṛtvā peṭikāyām agrathitāni grathitāny aṅga-bhūṣaṇa-rūpāṇi ca yāvanti sthitāni
GR14muktacau:147: tāvanti yathā-yuktam alpāny eva saṃrakṣyāṅgataḥ samuttāritāni ca mauktikāni

GR14muktacau:153: tataḥ katipayadināntare svasvakedārikāsu jātān hiṃsralatāṅkurān dṛṣṭvā
GR14muktacau:156: ekasmin dine gorasānāmatīvavyayaṃ svasvagṛhasya ca nimauktikatāṃ vīkṣya gopāḥ
GR14muktacau:161: kṛto mauktikakedārikānāṃ nimittaṃ bahulo vyayo'cirādeva bahutaralābho
GR14muktacau:165: athaikadā viśākhayā svadekārikāsu tānaṅkurānnirīkṣya kāsāñcit karṇe
GR14muktacau:169: dṛṣṭā ete tu tādṛśā na dṛśyante /
GR14muktacau:172: atha katipayadivasaistāsāṃ rādhādīnāmanyāsāṃ ca kedārikāsu kaṇṭakādicihnena
GR14muktacau:173: latābhirnijarūpe prakāśyamāne gopīkedārikāsu hiṃsrā latā jātā iti sakalagokula
GR14muktacau:175: etad ākarṇya vayasya-dvārā gāndharvā-goṣṭhyāṃ mayedaṃ sotprāsaṃ vijñāpitaṃ
GR14muktacau:176: śrutaṃ bhavatīnāṃ kedārikāsu bahūni muktā-phalāni jātāni santi / ahaṃ tāvat
GR14muktacau:177: snigdhas tat sa-vayasyāya mahyaṃ prathama-phalāni dīyantām /
GR14muktacau:179: yadi vayaṃ kṛṣim akariṣyāmas tadā sakala-goṣṭhaṃ
GR14muktacau:184: tad ākarṇya mayā nikhila-vayasyāḥ savatsā gāvaḥ śakaṭa-vahā mahiṣyaḥ,
GR14muktacau:188: tataś ca gopyo lajjayā sva-bhūṣaṇa-vyatirekeṇa bahu-dhana-vināśena gopa-bhiyā ca
GR14muktacau:189: kim atra yuktam iti mantrayitum ārebhire /
GR14muktacau:191: dhūrta-nāndīmukhyā'bhadreṇa pratāritāḥ sma ity ābhāṣya sarps.aṃ tan-nikaṭam

GR14muktacau:197: nāndī / yato garvitābhir yuṣmābhir ḍhakkā-vādyavat kolāhala-prapañcena
GR14muktacau:198: savayasya-gaṇasya tasya śravaṇa-kuhare suṣṭhu-gocarīkṛtya kedārikāsu muktāḥ

GR14muktacau:222: tebhyo mauktikeṣu darśiteṣv eva śithilī bhavet /

GR14muktacau:236: anumatyā bahu-suvarṇāni gṛhītvā mauktika-vāṭikā-samīpaṃ te ājagmatuḥ / tatra

GR14muktacau:274: ātmano'bhīṣṭa-mūlyaṃ svayam eva sphuṭaṃ nigadya na kathaṃ
GR14muktacau:279: grahītuṃ kāñcanalataiva vicāryānargha-mūlyatvena parikalpya rādhādibhiḥ prahitya
GR14muktacau:285: yadi vā asyā bakṣasi svarṇa-sampūṭa-rūpa-phala-dvaye bahavaś
GR14muktacau:286: cintāmaṇayo'pi santīti candramukhī vakṣati tathāpi na / yato
GR14muktacau:289: tac chrutvā bhrū-bhaṅgena mām avalokayantī kāñcanalatā saroṣam āha -
GR14muktacau:291: tadaiva mayoktaṃ tasya dhṛṣṭasya savidhe mayā na
GR14muktacau:296: satyaṃ kathayasi tat katham ekākinyā mayā
GR14muktacau:298: kathaṃ vā nijane'tra sthātavyaṃ ekayoga-nirdiṣṭānāṃ saha
GR14muktacau:299: vā pravṛttiḥ saha vā nivṛttir iti mayāpi gantavyam /
GR14muktacau:302: tadaiva mayoktaṃ yad etābhyāṃ mūlya-nirṇayo na
GR14muktacau:304: tac chrutvā tayoḥ savidham āgatya subalenoktam - sakhi candramukhi/
GR14muktacau:308: samakṣam eva samucita-mūlyaṃ pradāya svepsita-muktāphalāni gṛhṇātu / tatra
GR14muktacau:310: iti niśamya candramukhī-kāñcanalate tāsāṃ savidhe gatvā sa-roṣam iva sarvaṃ
GR14muktacau:312: tataś ca rādhā lalitādibhiḥ saha mauktika-bāṭī-prāntam āsādya
GR14muktacau:313: candramukhī-dvārā subalam ākārya tam āha - priya-vayasya subala / asmāsu
GR14muktacau:315: ataḥ svayam eva tathā vidhīyatāṃ yathāsmābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:317: tac chrutvā subalena mahyaṃ nivedya mad-vacanena mat-sannidhau tā lalitādayaḥ
GR14muktacau:319: mad-upadrāvaka-sva-priya-vayasyāya sarvathā na prakāśanīyam iti subalam
GR14muktacau:322: tato mayā tāḥ sarvā nibhālya rādhā kathaṃ na dṛśyate ity ukte tuṅgavidyayoktam -
GR14muktacau:324: sā khalu sa-praṇayaṃ āryayā jaṭilayā kasyacid
GR14muktacau:329: muktā-grahaṇecchā tasyā na vidyate iti dṛśyate /
GR14muktacau:337: kintu yā khalu svayam āgatya na
GR14muktacau:340: dīyantām iti me sarveṣāṃ sakhīnāṃ sudṛḍho nirṇayaḥ /
GR14muktacau:341: tad anu subalaṃ prati mayoktaṃ - sakhe subala/
GR14muktacau:343: ānīya purataḥ prasārya vicitya sarva-kaniṣṭhāny eva mauktikāni pūrvakṛtaṃ
GR14muktacau:344: tat-kārpaṇyam apy avigaṇayya prathamaṃ tat-kṛte viśākhāyāṃ samarpya tat-sakāśāc
GR14muktacau:346: yadi vā prastutaṃ dātuṃ na śaknoti tatas tad-abhinneyam /
GR14muktacau:347: tāvat puṣpa-pravāla-corikā gopa-kanyakā yatra rakṣyante tatraivārān
GR14muktacau:355: para-rāmā-sparśo lajjā-tyāgaś cāsmad-vidhānāṃ svapne'py atīvāyogyas tathāpi -
GR14muktacau:356: sva-kāryam uddharet prājñaḥ kurvann api vigarhitaḥ /
GR14muktacau:358: āhāre vyavahāre ca lajjām api parityajet /
GR14muktacau:359: iti saṃhitā-vacana-balād aham eva prahariko bhavan sarvām eva rātriṃ jāgran
GR14muktacau:361: iti niśamya subalaḥ sa-smitam āha - puruṣottama/
GR14muktacau:364: tato mayoktaṃ - yad artham iyaṃ rakṣyate sā yāvat niḥśeṣaṃ mūlya-dravyaṃ
GR14muktacau:366: kiṃ vā kiyad-dravyaṃ gṛhītvā svayam evāgatya dhruvam asyāḥ
GR14muktacau:367: snehād ittham atra sthitvā avaśiṣṭa-dravyānayanārtham enāṃ prasthāpayati / tāvad
GR14muktacau:371: sarva-karmaṇi vicakṣaṇā viśeṣataḥ palāyane gavya-ghaṭṭyāṃ dānādiṣu sarvair
GR14muktacau:373: tvaṃ tv aniśaam udghūrṇase tena me
GR14muktacau:384: catvāro rajani-yāmā drutam eva viramanti / athavā
GR14muktacau:390: sarvāś ca sakhīr avalokayantī āha - candrāvalī-keli-kuraṅga/
GR14muktacau:395: apehai apehīti vadantī sakhī-madhye līnā babhūva /
GR14muktacau:396: tataḥ sarvābhiḥ subalaṃ praty uktaṃ - subala/
GR14muktacau:400: tarhi muktāḥ pradarśya samucita-mūlyena pradīyantām / no
GR14muktacau:403: iti niśamya subalena sampuṭānudghāṭya tābhyāṃ mauktikāni pradarśya māṃ praty
GR14muktacau:406: samasta-godhanāni ca vikrīyāpi ekasyāpi mūlyaṃ dātum aśakyam / etāḥ khalu
GR14muktacau:409: api vismṛtya māṃ ca tva-anugatam avekṣya yat-kiñcin-mūlyaṃ gṛhītvā vinā-mūlyena
GR14muktacau:410: dattavad āsām abhīpsita-mauktikāni dātum ājñā kriyatām /
GR14muktacau:416: tad yat kiñcid alpam eva mayā mṛgyate
GR14muktacau:418: kiṃ ca utkocaṃ gṛhītvā bāraṃ bāraṃ mama
GR14muktacau:419: ghaṭṭī-dāna-dravyāṇi bhavatā vināśitāni sanītit mama kenāpi kathitam asti
GR14muktacau:420: tasmān mūlya-dravyaṃ samakṣam eva mayaivābhyo grahītavyam /
GR14muktacau:423: svīya-svīyābhīpsita-mauktikāni vicitya pṛthak pṛthak kuṭī-kṛtāni dṛṣṭvā
GR14muktacau:425: tato'ham abruvam - bhadraṃ darśayantu sva-svābhīpsita-mauktikāni mūlyaṃ
GR14muktacau:428: etāḥ vinayena yan nivedayanti tat kṛpayāvadhārya
GR14muktacau:431: kathyatāṃ kiṃ nivedayanti yuktaṃ cet kartavyam /
GR14muktacau:434: samagra-mūlya-dravyāṇāṃ ca samācayanaṃ dina-dvaya-madhya eva sampadyate /
GR14muktacau:435: gurukulaṃ tu mauktikālaṅkārādy-adarśanāt kṣaṇe kṣaṇe khidyamānaṃ bāḍham
GR14muktacau:436: ākrośati / ato'tisnigdhān bhavad-vidhān avagatya lajjām api parihāya
GR14muktacau:437: nirjana-vanāntaram āgatānām asmākam ṛṇenaiva mauktikāni dāpayitvā drutam
GR14muktacau:440: abhīpsita-vṛddhi-sahitāni dina-dvayābhyantare pariśodhya praheyāṇi yady asmāsu
GR14muktacau:441: bhavad-vayasyasya pratītir na jāyate tadā tvam evāsmākaṃ pratibhūr bhaveti /
GR14muktacau:442: tasmāt parama-pratīti-pātrābhyaḥ santata-satyavādinībhya etābhyaḥ pratītiṃ kṛtvā
GR14muktacau:443: datteṣu mauktikeṣu mūlya-dravyam abhīpsita-vṛddhiś cācirāl lapsyate /
GR14muktacau:452: praviśya dravyam adattvā yadi khelyantyas tiṣṭheyus tarhi tvayā kiṃ kartavyam /
GR14muktacau:455: etāḥ khalu naivaṃ kariṣyanti / yadi vā
GR14muktacau:456: kuryus tadojjvala-vanāntārjuna-kokilādibhiḥ saha tatra gatvā svayam ābhiḥ
GR14muktacau:458: etāsāṃ bhartṛṣu saṃśrāvya tat-prāpty-arthaṃ tebhyas tathā bhayaṃ
GR14muktacau:460: yathā ta eva drutam amūs tvat-samīpaṃ prasthāpya tad
GR14muktacau:462: tan niśamya madhumaṅgalena sa-krodham uktaṃ - re subala/
GR14muktacau:467: abalānāṃ phutkāraṃ kṣudrād atikṣudratareṣu tad-bhartṛṣu kartuṃ yad icchasi /
